channel.title: Haskell on Tom's ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Haskell on Tom's ramblings

item.title: Foldable for non-Haskellers: Haskell's controversial FTP proposal
item.description: In the Haskell world, there is currently a big fuss about the “Foldable/Traversable in Prelude”-proposal. Edit: For the record: it was a proposal, and has been implemented in the current version of Haskell (GHC)

item.title: Hangman in Haskell
item.description: As I noticed a question for a more idiomatic Haskell version of the game Hangman on codereview.stackoverflow.com, I decided to give it a go; this is the result:
